description: Grants the ability to create and control special hormones that can alter the recipient's body in various ways, including gender, temperature, healing, and energy levels.

users.circumstances: Emporio Ivankov ate the fruit sometime after the God Valley Incident

abilityReveals.description: Ivankov injects Luffy with a second dose of adrenaline-affecting hormones that relieve tension and restore energy for an entire day. However, there is a severe limit - a second dose is the absolute maximum and the recipient will not be able to get up again afterward.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Luffy desperately requests another dose to continue fighting to save Ace, despite knowing it will severely shorten his lifespan and have dangerous aftereffects.

weaknesses.weakness: Tension Hormones have severe aftereffects including nausea and tiredness
There is a hard limit on how many doses can be given - a second dose is the absolute maximum
Repeated use may shorten the recipient's lifespan

strengths.strength: Can provide emergency energy restoration to exhausted individuals
strengths.description: Allows someone at the brink of collapse to regain strength for continued combat.

description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into magma, making them a Magma Human. The magma is hot enough to burn even fire.

users.circumstances: Akainu ate the fruit at an unknown time before becoming an Admiral

abilityReveals.description: Akainu transforms his arm into a magma hound shape and launches it as a devastating ranged attack. The magma blast is powerful enough to cause massive destruction.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Akainu uses this attack against Whitebeard during their intense battle, though Whitebeard deflects it causing further destruction to Marineford plaza.

strengths.strength: Magma is superior to fire in temperature and destructive power
strengths.description: The extreme heat and destructive capacity makes it one of the most offensive Devil Fruits.

description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into light, making them a Light Human. The user can move at the speed of light and fire devastating laser beams.

users.circumstances: Kizaru ate the fruit at an unknown time before becoming an Admiral

abilityReveals.abilityName: Coordinated Laser Beam Attack on Marco
abilityReveals.description: Kizaru fires two precise laser beams that pierce through Marco's body when the Phoenix commander is distracted, demonstrating the strategic use of his light-speed attacks.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Used to exploit Marco's momentary distraction when he was worried about Whitebeard, successfully wounding one of the strongest Whitebeard Pirates commanders.

strengths.strength: Can exploit momentary distractions with precision light-speed attacks
strengths.description: The speed and precision of light-based attacks makes them deadly when opponents are not fully focused.

description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into ice, making them an Ice Human. The user can freeze anything they touch and create massive ice structures.

users.circumstances: Aokiji ate the fruit at an unknown time before becoming an Admiral

abilityReveals.description: Aokiji demonstrates the ability to freeze even a diamond-bodied opponent solid when they are caught off-guard, showing that his ice can overcome even the hardest natural defenses.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Used to freeze Jozu completely when he was distracted by Marco being wounded, removing another powerful Whitebeard commander from battle.

strengths.strength: Can freeze opponents with diamond-hard bodies when they are vulnerable
strengths.description: The ice powers can overcome even the strongest physical defenses if the opponent is not actively defending.
